description: Retrieves a list of all active sessions (both connected and disconnected) or terminated sessions from the past 30 days.

parameters.name: State
parameters.description: The session status to retrieve a list of sessions for. For example, 'Active'.

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: One or more filters to limit the type of sessions returned by the request. (dict) --- Describes a filter for Session Manager information. The name of the filter. The filter value. Valid values for each filter key are as follows: InvokedAfter: Specify a timestamp to limit your results. For example, specify 2024-08-29T00:00:00Z to see sessions that started August 29, 2024, and later. InvokedBefore: Specify a timestamp to limit your results. For example, specify 2024-08-29T00:00:00Z to see sessions that started before August 29, 2024. Target: Specify a managed node to which session connections have been made. Owner: Specify an Amazon Web Services user to see a list of sessions started by that user. Status: Specify a valid session status to see a list of all sessions with that status. Status values you can specify include: Connected Connecting Disconnected Terminated Terminating Failed SessionId: Specify a session ID to return details about the session.

nested_params.name: value
nested_params.description: The filter value. Valid values for each filter key are as follows:

nested_items.name: Sessions
nested_items.description: A list of sessions meeting the request parameters.

nested_items.name: Target
nested_items.description: The managed node that the Session Manager session connected to.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the session. For example, 'Connected' or 'Terminated'.

nested_items.name: StartDate
nested_items.description: The date and time, in ISO-8601 Extended format, when the session began.

nested_items.name: EndDate
nested_items.description: The date and time, in ISO-8601 Extended format, when the session was terminated.

nested_items.name: DocumentName
nested_items.description: The name of the Session Manager SSM document used to define the parameters and plugin settings for the session. For example, SSM-SessionManagerRunShell.

nested_items.name: Owner
nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon Web Services user that started the session.

nested_items.name: Reason
nested_items.description: The reason for connecting to the instance.

nested_items.name: MaxSessionDuration
nested_items.description: The maximum duration of a session before it terminates.

nested_items.name: AccessType
nested_items.description: Standard access type is the default for Session Manager sessions. JustInTime is the access type for Just-in-time node access.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token for the next set of items to return. (You received this token from a previous call.)
